ErrorIndex.title: Wrapper for index information inside an error.

ErrorResponse.description: Generic error response for REST APIs

code.description: the numeric HTTP error code for the response.

details.description: The optional details of the error response.

dictionary.description:
Dictionary/map of associated data/information relevant to the error.
The error "message" may contain {{name}} escapes that should be substituted
with information from this dictionary.

domain.description:
The "domain" for the error.  If empty, it is an EDA
core error.  Alternatively it can be an EDA application
"apiVersion" value (e.g. interfaces.eda.nokia.com/v1alpha1)
indicating that the error is specific to that application.
The domain gives the receiver information that they can use
to help them interpret the "internal" error code value, or
to find an internationalization translation for the message.

errors.description:
Collection of errors in cases where more than one exists. This needs to be
flexible so we can support multiple formats

internal.description: Internal error code in cases where we don't have an array of errors

message.description: The basic text error message for the error response.

ref.description: Reference to the error source. Should typically be the URI of the request

type.description:
URI pointing at a document that describes the error and mitigation steps
If there is no document, point to the RFC for the HTTP error code

Status.title: Status is a return value for calls that don't return other objects.

id.description: A workflow identifier; these are assigned by the system to a posted workflow.

ack.description: acknowledge or reject the input request

input.description: provide a json blob to the workflow

com.nokia.eda.appstore.v1.AppInstaller.description: AppInstaller is the Schema for the appinstallers API

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: The apiVersion must be set to appstore.eda.nokia.com/v1
The kind must be set to AppInstaller

apps.description: Apps are the input apps to the installer.

appId.description: AppID of the app, which is the unique identifier of an app. It should be equal to the group of the app.
appId.title: App ID

appSettings.description:
AppSettings defines a list of variables and their value. Only variables that are customised need to be mentioned.
If AppSettings are not again mentioned on upgrade, values will remain as is.
appSettings.title: App Settings

catalog.description:
Catalog of the app to be installed.
This is where app manifest is retrieved from, along with some other metadata.
catalog.title: Catalog

version.description: Version of the App that is to be installed.

type.description:
The version type of the App. Currently supported: semver, commit.
Default is semver.
type.title: Type

value.description:
The version of the App.
If the VersionType is set to semver,
then the semantic version of the git tag in the form of "apps/<appname>/<semver>" is used.
If the VersionType is set to commit,
then the commit reference (e.g. git hash) is expected.
value.title: Value

version.title: Version

apps.title: Apps

autoProcessRequirements.description:
AutoProcessRequirements tells the installer what it can do w.r.t. the requirements of an app.
Currently only 'strict' is supported.
autoProcessRequirements.title: Auto Process Requirements

operation.description:
Operation is the installing operation.
Currently supported are 'install', 'delete'.
operation.title: Operation

id.description: ID is the workflow ID that can be used to get more information on.
id.title: ID

com.nokia.eda.appstore.v1.AppInstallerLi.description: AppInstallerList is a list of appinstallers

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: A valid name is made up of one or more components where each component is separated by period characters.  Each component must start and end with a lower case alphanumeric character and the body of the component is made up of zero or more lower case alphanumeric and hyphen characters.

com.nokia.eda.appstore.v1.Catalog.description: Catalog is the Schema for the catalogs API

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: The apiVersion must be set to appstore.eda.nokia.com/v1
The kind must be set to Catalog

spec.description: CatalogSpec defines the desired state of a Catalog.

authSecretRef.description:
AuthSecretRef is the authentication secret reference, used for authentication.
Must be in the same namespace as the catalog.
authSecretRef.title: Authentication Secret Reference

description.description: Description is an optional short description of the catalog.
description.title: Description

refreshInterval.description:
RefreshInterval tells the controller how often it should check the remote catalog for new updates, in seconds.
Default is 180 seconds. Minimum is 30 seconds for production environments; 10 seconds for test environments.
refreshInterval.title: Refresh Interval

remoteType.description: RemoteType type of the catalog, only 'git' is supported at the moment.
remoteType.title: Remote Type

remoteURL.description:
RemoteURL is the HTTP(S) remote URL of the catalog. Supported URI schemes: 'https://' and 'http://'.
Default is HTTPS if no scheme is given.
remoteURL.title: Remote URL

skipTLSVerify.description: SkipTLSVerify skips the validity check for the server's certificate. This will make HTTPS connections insecure.
skipTLSVerify.title: Skip TLS Verify

title.description: Title is an UI-friendly name for the catalog.
title.title: Title

spec.title: Specification

status.description: CatalogStatus defines the observed state of a Catalog.

error.description: Error denotes the last error that was encountered by the controller.
error.title: Error

lastRefreshTime.description: LastRefreshTime is the last attempt to refresh the catalog cache by the controller.
lastRefreshTime.title: Last Refresh Time

operational.description: Operational reports whether the catalog remote is operational.
operational.title: Operational

status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.appstore.v1.CatalogList.description: CatalogList is a list of catalogs

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: A valid name is made up of one or more components where each component is separated by period characters.  Each component must start and end with a lower case alphanumeric character and the body of the component is made up of zero or more lower case alphanumeric and hyphen characters.

com.nokia.eda.appstore.v1.Registry.description: Registry is the Schema for the registries API

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: The apiVersion must be set to appstore.eda.nokia.com/v1
The kind must be set to Registry

spec.description: RegistrySpec defines the desired state of a Registry

authSecretRef.description:
AuthSecretRef is the authentication secret reference, used for authentication.
Must be in the same namespace as the catalog.
authSecretRef.title: Authentication Secret Reference

mirror.description:
Mirror registry of the original remote registry.
App store will use the mirror instead of the original registry that is referenced by a catalog.
mirror.title: Mirror

remoteURL.description:
RemoteURL is the remote URL of the registry. Supported URI schemes: 'https://' and 'http://'.
	Default is HTTPS if no scheme is given.
remoteURL.title: Remote URL

title.description: Title is an UI-friendly name for the catalog.
title.title: Title

spec.title: Specification

status.description: RegistryStatus defines the observed state of Registry

error.description: Error denotes the last error that was encountered by the controller.
error.title: Error

reachable.description: Reachable indicates if the registry is reachable.
reachable.title: Reachable

status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.appstore.v1.RegistryList.description: RegistryList is a list of registries

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: A valid name is made up of one or more components where each component is separated by period characters.  Each component must start and end with a lower case alphanumeric character and the body of the component is made up of zero or more lower case alphanumeric and hyphen characters.

delete.description:
Delete all instances of Catalog.  If Catalog is a namespaced resource, all instances in all namespaces will
be deleted, and this is restricted to users with the system-administrator role.
If a non-namespaced Catalog, it deletes all instances of that non-namespaced resource.

parameters.description: a label selector string to filter the set of CRs deleted based on CR labels
parameters.name: label-selector

default.description: Details of an error in response to an API REST request.

get.description: The resulting resources can optionally be a subset of the resource content by using the "fields" query parameter.

parameters.description: a comma-separated list of resource fields to fetch/return.  If unspecified, all fields are fetched.  If empty, only key-fields are fetched.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: an EQL "where" expression that will be used to filter the set of resources returned.
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
parameters.name: label-selector
